name: cleaner Inkbunny submissions with Text-to-Image
description: Just a simple script to clean up any Inkbunny submission pages if you use Text-to-Image https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/text-to-image/
additional_info: this script was created and is updated by trial and error, there will be small discrepancies between types of submission pages but I believe I have worked out any blatant errors
